short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces LinkedIn videos with Shia LaBeouf

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I got sick of looking at the terrible videos that people post on LinkedIn while job hunting, so I took a break and wrote an extension to replace them with something...different.

This extension takes those uninteresting videos and just replaces them with Shia LaBeouf screaming "JUST DO IT!". These videos don't automatically play (unlike LinkedIn's videos), it just gives you a friendly reminder to keep going and to not give up on your job hunt or whatever else you may be procrastinating on.

This extension also preserves the videos it replaces so you can restore them if you want to for some reason.

Source is available here if you're interested in creating your own version (it's super easy): https://github.com/milesoberstadt/better-motivation
